creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
description: white robed male figure standing in profile; figure appears to be looking outward toward viewer with large PR eye; hands clasped in front; bare PR foot visible at LR; inscription ULQ
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, and Seal

ULQ ULC:  [ 雲室道 人時年七十有三 ]
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Daruma
